attributes.name: data-zui-dialog-button
attributes.description: Defines a button that controls the dialog.

values.name: cancel
values.description: When the element is clicked, the dialog will be closed.

values.name: next
values.description: When the element is clicked, the next panel will be activated.

values.name: previous
values.description: When the element is clicked, the previous panel will be activated.

attributes.name: data-zui-dialog-remove-on-close
attributes.description: Can be set to clean up the HTML code of the dialog element after closing.

values.name: false
values.description: Keeps the HTML code of the dialog element after the dialog has been closed.

values.name: true
values.description: Cleans up the HTML code of the dialog element after the dialog has been closed.

attributes.name: data-zui-dialog-trigger
attributes.description: Bind this attribute to an element that will trigger the dialog when clicked.

values.name: CSS selector
values.description: A CSS selector that refers to the dialog that should be opened.

values.name: URL
values.description: An URL to the page that loads the dialog so that the dialog can be opened via AJAX.

classes.name: zui-dialog
classes.description: The class that defines an element as a dialog.

classes.name: zui-dialog-inline
classes.description: Shows the dialog inline the page, so no popup is opened.

classes.name: zui-dialog-tiny
classes.description: Converts the dialog to a tiny dialog.

classes.name: zui-dialog-small
classes.description: Converts the dialog to a small dialog.

classes.name: zui-dialog-medium
classes.description: Converts the dialog to a medium dialog.

classes.name: zui-dialog-large
classes.description: Converts the dialog to a large dialog.

classes.name: zui-dialog-xlarge
classes.description: Converts the dialog to a large dialog.

classes.name: zui-dialog-full
classes.description: Converts the dialog to a full screen dialog.

classes.name: zui-dialog-header
classes.description: Defines the HTML element as the header of the dialog.

classes.name: zui-dialog-footer
classes.description: Defines the HTML element as the footer of the dialog.

classes.name: zui-dialog-footer-left
classes.description: The left side of the footer, can be used to display hints.

classes.name: zui-dialog-footer-right
classes.description: The right side of the footer, the place where the buttons are.

classes.name: zui-dialog-page-body
classes.description: The container that contains the panels on a page.

classes.name: zui-dialog-menu
classes.description: The element that contains the menu for a page.

classes.name: zui-dialog-panel
classes.description: The element that contains the content of a panel.

events.name: zui-dialog-button-clicked
events.description: Called when a button in the dialog is clicked.

events.name: zui-dialog-button-cancel-clicked
events.description: Called when the cancel button is clicked.

events.name: zui-dialog-button-next-clicked
events.description: Called when the next button is clicked.

events.name: zui-dialog-button-previous-clicked
events.description: Called when the previous button is clicked.

events.name: zui-dialog-closing
events.description: Called before the dialog is closed.

events.name: zui-dialog-closed
events.description: Called after the dialog has been closed.

events.name: zui-dialog-panel-activating
events.description: Called when a panel is about to become active.

events.name: zui-dialog-panel-activated
events.description: Called when a panel has been made active.

events.name: zui-dialog-panel-deactivating
events.description: Called when a panel is about to be deactivated.

events.name: zui-dialog-panel-deactivated
events.description: Called when a panel has been deactivated.

events.name: zui-dialog-opening
events.description: Called when a dialog is about to be opened.

events.name: zui-dialog-opened
events.description: Called when a dialog has been opened.

events.name: zui-dialog-centered
events.description: Called when a dialog has been centered in the mididle of the screen. Called after zui-dialog-opened.
